result.title: Bst Spiral manner print
result.content:
Guys I have encountered this question recently ..give a n that make a complete binary tree with n node definitely you have to print the tree in spiral manner as shown in image

suppose as shown in image n=31 and output is 1,3,7,15,31,30,29,28,27,26,25,24,23,22,21,20,19,18,17,16,8,4,2,6,14,13,12,11,10,9,5

Can any one tell me code for it?? url of image: https://www.screencast.com/t/OnPJVyzH2cs6
